text:
One thing is for certain: if we do nothing, these programs will fail to exist as we know them.

html: Social Security, and Medicare as well, need structural reforms if they are to survive for younger generations. We can do this without touching the benefits for people at or near retirement age, and with limited changes for younger Americans, but we have to act soon. 2/3
text:
Social Security, and Medicare as well, need structural reforms if they are to survive for younger generations. We can do this without touching the benefits for people at or near retirement age, and with limited changes for younger Americans, but we have to act soon.
 2/3

html: As South Carolina’s Governor and United States Senator, Fritz Hollings was a statesman in every sense of the word. Our state and our country are better off because of his contributions. His legacy will serve as an inspiration to others for generations to come.
text: As South Carolina’s Governor and United States Senator, Fritz Hollings was a statesman in every sense of the word. Our state and our country are better off because of his contributions. His legacy will serve as an inspiration to others for generations to come.

html: Earlier today, I joined 191 of my colleagues and signed a discharge petition to force a vote on Rep. Ann Wagner’s Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. Infants who survive an abortion should receive the same level of medical care as any other child. #BornAlivepic.twitter.com/xAG7uSfE6N
text: Earlier today, I joined 191 of my colleagues and signed a discharge petition to force a vote on Rep. Ann Wagner’s Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. Infants who survive an abortion should receive the same level of medical care as any other child. #BornAlivepic.twitter.com/xAG7uSfE6N

html: I recently met with @AIPAC representatives from our district to discuss U.S./Israeli relations. I also added my name to a House Appropriations Committee letter requesting that none of our taxpayer dollars be allocated to organizations that are part of any anti-Semitic movement.pic.twitter.com/d6eAK6FFJJ

html: I visited @BMWUSA , @BauschLomb, and @MillikenandCo . They directly employ over 16,000 people. The number of jobs that have been created in the supply chain and supporting industries as a result of these manufacturers is exponentially higher. I am proud to call District 4 home.pic.twitter.com/n3O1x6pDZY
text:
I visited @BMWUSA , @BauschLomb, and @MillikenandCo . They directly employ over 16,000 people. The number of jobs that have been created in the supply chain and supporting industries as a result of these manufacturers is exponentially higher. 

I am proud to call District 4 home.pic.twitter.com/n3O1x6pDZY

html: BMW’s two new models, (X3 M and X4 M) along with the seven other models built at BMW’s sole U.S. plant means the plant will increase production in 2019 and reach close to record levels last seen in 2016. Expected to be north of 400,000 vehicles this year.
text: BMW’s two new models, (X3 M and X4 M) along with the seven other models built at BMW’s sole U.S. plant means the plant will increase production in 2019 and reach close to record levels last seen in 2016.  Expected to be north of 400,000 vehicles this year.

html: Democrats decry federal workers not getting paid in one breath and then cancel votes to leave town early in another. Ridiculous—the shutdown is 33 days old. Where is the sense of urgency? There is zero reason anyone in Congress should go home until this is resolved. Period.
text: Democrats decry federal workers not getting paid in one breath and then cancel votes to leave town early in another. Ridiculous—the shutdown is 33 days old. Where is the sense of urgency? There is zero reason anyone in Congress should go home until this is resolved. Period.

html: We at @HouseGOP voted again this week to retroactively pay federal workers impacted by the shutdown. Democrats only want to tell the @POTUS no, but they need to negotiate to end this shutdown.
text: We at @HouseGOP voted again this week to retroactively pay federal workers impacted by the shutdown. Democrats only want to tell the @POTUS no, but they need to negotiate to end this shutdown.

html: Please join my staff and me for our official district office openings tomorrow, January 7. We will be opening the Greenville office (104 S. Main St., Greenville, SC 29601) at 10:00am and the Spartanburg office (101 West St. John St. Spartanburg, SC 29306) at 3:00pm. 1/2
text:
Please join my staff and me for our official district office openings tomorrow, January 7. We will be opening the Greenville office (104 S. Main St., Greenville, SC 29601) at 10:00am and the Spartanburg office (101 West St. John St. Spartanburg, SC 29306) at 3:00pm.

1/2
